title: What were the inspirations, if any, for Championship Riven?
body: Since Championship Shyvahna just came out, i thought i'd bring this question up. I bought the Riven skin mostly for the splash, and bc it reminded me a lot of my favorite anime, Claymore. Does anyone know what the 'official', Red-post-confirmed inspirations were?

replies.body: Hey, this is a great question and I've passed it on to the skins team internally to see if we can get a response for you. I'm also curious!

> Hey, this is a great question and I've passed it on to the skins team internally to see if we can get a response for you. I'm also curious!

I asked a number of Rioters this at the Season 3 World Championships last year.  From what they told me, the impetus was a champion who had a huge impact on the season that was released that year.

Season 2 was Riven
Season 3 was Thresh

I guess for Season 4, the skins team threw that notion right out with the Insitute of War ;)

It really should have been either Braum or Jinx, in my opinion
